relation: Great for these types of students
There is always some one around and willing to help you. Also their are blue boxes where you can call for help if there is an emergency.
Students who are looking for a special major or are just not sure what they want to do for their major.

There are multiple opportunities to get involved in different groups. This causes you to be able to do what you want to do with people that want the same thing. Also the Student Union really works on having different events through out the year.
They are in the process of redoing the cafeteria and just put a Starbucks serving coffee shop in.
It is definitely a community college. There are some classes that are extremely challenging but many are not too bad.
Make friends with the financial aid workers. Also, always be nice to the people that you think are not important. They are the ones that normally can help you the most.
It has a great atmosphere. All the staff and teachers are great. If you have a problem, you can find a solution.
pageTitle: Phoenix College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {226737=I would reccommend that prospective students ask as many questions of the enrollment counselor as possible. Once enrolled, use all of the help services, and especially the grammar checker in the library., 242541=Carrington College provides a great learning environment with instructors and staff who truely want their students to succeed. It provides smaller class sizes where you can get more 1:1 instruction. At the end of your program, they make a portfolio for you and assist with job placement., 100442=My children are my world. I have tow boys and one daughter that I will be soon giving birth to in July. Attending college is fun considering that I have a chance to make my children future brighter and easier for them to attend college,, 224470=I have to say that the bang for the buck is the support or team graduation behind me. I have a dedicated team of counselors and academic counselors to help me and give me tips on how to succeed as a student. The library has a program to download that takes the mystery out of APA papers, a generator to check grammar and spelling before turning in a paper, plus a math prep workshop, as well as other workshops. University of Phoenix has many tools to help the student succeed. No short cuts, but great support and support tools., 207569=For what you pay which is about 1100 dollars per semester, you definitely get your moneys worth., 362061=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 46618=Try Phoenix you can't go wrong. I have been in school now almost a year come Febuary 23, 2010.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Great for these types of students This school is great for students who have other responsibilities and can not afford to be tied down to one location. Tips for prospective students If you do not think you have the time for school, forget that thought! You always have time for school, especially if it is online! Online schedules work for you. Bang for the buck Less expensive than other school, but same education. Am enjoying being here I am taking my classes online, and I love how flexible my schedules are. Am learning a lot The courses available really stretch your mind to new levels. Login to rate or flag the reviews Andre from Chandler, AZ 12/14/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 4 of 100
